Review of complete video footage: The expert watched complete video footage of both speeches given by Gov. Scott Walker in California and Wisconsin to verify if the same ideas were presented in both locations.
Analysis of media coverage: The expert reviewed media coverage of both speeches to determine if there were any discrepancies or differences in the reporting of the ideas presented.
Examination of coverage of caucus appear: The expert also reviewed coverage of Gov. Walker's appearance at a Republican Senate caucus meeting to assess if he discussed his legislative agenda in detail during that event.
Comparison of themes discussed: The expert specifically focused on four main themes that Gov. Walker touched on in California regarding his plans for the final two years of his first term. By comparing these themes between the California and Wisconsin speeches, the expert could determine if the ideas were consistent or if there were any variations.
